channel.title: Soft tube on Artur L Gower
channel.description: Recent content in Soft tube on Artur L Gower

item.title: Morphology of residually stressed tubular tissues: Beyond the elastic multiplicative decomposition
item.description: Illustrates the kind of wrinkling instabilities that appear for different distributions of residual stress. These studies can help explain the morphology of tubular structures. For a growing tissue, like our intestine, to form a specific type of wrinkle, it need only generate the right kind of stress, then the tube will spontaneously wrinkle.
